Package com.karangandhi.networking.TCP

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connection.onCloseExceptions
    This is a callback that is called if there is a exception that is thrown while closing the connection
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection<T extends OwnerObject>
    This class handles the connection between the server and client.
    TCPClient
    This is the TCPClient class which will create a client that connects to the server on the given port
    TCPServer
    This is the Server class and is used to create the tcp server.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Connection.DefaultMessages
    The default messages of the connection that is used during the authentication
    Connection.Owner
    The enum that is passed in the constructor stating that the owner is the client or the server
